short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bluesky Shush automatically removes reposts from selected users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Bluesky Shush Chrome extension allows you filter reposts by selected users. Once installed, you'll see a "Shush reposts" link beside each repost in your feed. If clicked, the user will be added to your local filter list and you'll no longer see reposts. You can remove any user by opening the extension from Chrome and "Unshush"-ing the user.
